PyWireframe V0.4¶

PyWireframe is a Python library for creating 3D wireframe graphics. It’s highly inefficient (it uses turtle graphics) and doesn’t support rotation.

Installation¶

Use the package manager pip to install PyWireframe.

pip install PyWireframe¶

Usage¶

PyWireframe has three different ways of rendering - Objects, Shapes, and Dynamic Objects. For info on the syntax for using these, see the relevant wiki pages. To start PyWireframe, use start() To render all existing objects, use refresh() To exit PyWireframe, use exit()

License¶

MIT

PyWireframe
